description.value:
Primary Energy: Water 5 (barrier of solid ice) Supporting Energy: Space 4 (medium range + wall area) / Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (60 feet long, 20 feet high OR hemisphere 10 feet diameter) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 11 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Water Potential + Water Mastery / Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Create wall of ice at medium range up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, 1 foot thick (or hemisphere 10 feet diameter). Each 10ft section has HP = 12 + Water Potential, DR 2 vs nonmagical damage. Creatures within area when created make [[/save type=reflex]] or take [[/damage 8 type=cold]] damage. Wall melts naturally over time. Saving Throw: Reflex (when wall is created in your space) Damage Type: Cold (energy) DR Interaction: Half DR ([[/damage 8 type=cold]] damage vs DR 4 becomes 8 - 2 = [[/damage 6]] damage) Success Scaling:

  • Duration/HP: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round (6 HP sections), 2 = full effect (12 HP sections), 3 = 10 minutes (24 HP, double), 4 = 1 hour (36 HP, triple, DR 4)
  • Initial damage: 0 = no damage, 1 = half (4), 2 = full (8), 3 = +8 (16), 4 = +16 (24)
